abstract: Sanofi-Aventis has extended its $69-a-share tender offer for all outstanding Genzyme common stock to Feb. 15.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis has extended its $69-a-share tender offer for all outstanding Genzyme common stock to Feb. 15.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis, the French drug giant, said on Monday that its $69-a-share tender offer for all outstanding Genzyme common stock, which was to have expired on Friday, had been extended to Feb. 15.

headline.main: Sanofi Extends Genzyme Tender Offer as Talks Drag On
